name: Super Mario Bros MMXXI
description:
--SUPER MARIO BROS MMXXI--

Fangame by G-Rex Studio

Description:

SUPER MARIO BROS MMXXI is a fan made mario clone game created by  G-Rex Studio. The main storyline of the game is same as original Super Mario Bros. Expect, here in this game the levels are different and not same from. There are also Special Worlds, which the more levels there are, the more fun!

(You can only unlock Special Worlds by not using warp pipes. The game was meant to be played fully, and if you use warp pipes then, it's up to you.)

(Also, If you accidentally notice an error regarding the game, level, object... make sure you report to me. Report here in the comments if you find any kind of bug glitch in the game and I will update it.)
